description: Jota could be loaned out by Saudi club - gossip
title: Jota could be loaned out by Saudi club - gossip
title_page: Jota could be loaned out by Saudi club - gossip - BBC Sport
maintext:
Portuguese winger Jota could be sent out on loan - just weeks after his Â£25m move from Celtic - because Saudi Arabian club Al-Ittihad want to free up squad space for a world-class striker. (Scottish Sun), external
Japan striker Kyogo Furuhashi has vowed to repay the love he has received from Celtic fans by firing the club to a third successive Scottish title after signing a new deal this summer. (Glasgow Times), external
